visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include the monthly average temperatures for a year. Custom colors should be applied to the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature' and a subtitle. The x-axis represents the months of the year, and the y-axis represents the temperature in degrees Celsius. The data series includes the monthly average temperatures for a year, with a custom color applied to the series. The chart's axes and labels are styled with specific colors and font sizes to enhance readability. Additional configurations include the chart's background color, margins, and legend settings, which are aligned to the right and positioned at the top of the chart. The spline chart is designed to provide a clear and visually appealing representation of the monthly temperature data.
